content:
Assign skills to Service Resources

To track each agent's areas of experience and their level of proficiency for each skill, assign skills to their service resource.

REQUIRED USER PERMISSIONS
Edit on service resources
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Professional, Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions with the Service Cloud

Open the Service Resources tab.
Select the service resources that you want to assign skills to.
In the Skills related list, click New Service Resource Skill.
Select a skill. 
Enter a skill level 0â€“10 based on how your business measures skill level.
Enter a start date, and if needed, an end date.
Click Save.

The service resource's skill now appears in their Skills related list.

SEE ALSO
Create Service Resources for Agents
title: Assigning Skills to Service Resources
